name: Human Reignition Project - Holiday Demo
description: Late 2018 demo of the Human Reignition Project. Totally updated from our Kickstarter-era demo, with fully redone sprites, backgrounds, and script. Contains the first 5 scenes of the game, introducing the characters of Ken, Kyou, Setsuna, and sort of Hitomi. Of course, all content is subject to change prior to release.
